header.title: AAIP Data Tracker

draws.noData: No draw data available for the selected filters.

footer.updateFrequency: Data is collected and updated every hour

disclaimer.title: IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER
disclaimer.main: This site is an UNOFFICIAL data analysis tool, provided for historical trend reference only, and does NOT represent the government's position or official information.
disclaimer.dataSource: All data is collected from publicly available sources and may not reflect real-time updates.
disclaimer.predictions: Predictions and insights are based on statistical analysis and should not be used as the sole basis for immigration decisions.
disclaimer.officialSource: Always refer to official Alberta government immigration website for authoritative information:

smartInsights.title: Smart Insights
smartInsights.noInsights: No significant insights at this time. Check back later!
smartInsights.disclaimer: These insights are generated based on historical data patterns and are for informational purposes only. Immigration policies may change without notice.

tools.title: Planning Tools
tools.quotaDesc: Estimated quota exhaustion dates based on historical usage rates
tools.enterDate: Enter your submission date and click Calculate
tools.competitivenessDesc: Current competition level for each stream based on quota usage, pool size, and application volume
tools.disclaimer: All calculations are based on historical data and current trends. Actual results may vary due to policy changes or other factors.

laborMarket.title: Alberta Labor Market Context
laborMarket.contextNote: This labor market information provides general context about employment trends in Alberta. It does NOT guarantee AAIP nomination outcomes.
